title: Metallica - Death Magnetic
description:
Metallica's latest album, Death Magnetic, is about to be released on the 12th of September. But I got hand of the complete album, and wanted to share it with you all.

Artist: Metallica
Album: Death Magnetic
Release Date: 12 September 2008
No. of tracks: 10
Total length: 1:14:42
Quality: 128 kbps :(

Tracklist:
01. That Was Just Your Life (7:08)
02. The End of the Line (7:52)
03. Broken, Beat & Scarred (6:25)
04. The Day That Never Comes (7:56)
05. All Nightmare Long (7:58)
06. Cyanide (6:39)
07. The Unforgiven III (7:46)
08. The Judas Kiss (8:00)
09. Suicide & Redemption (9:57)
10. My Apocalypse (5:01)

Please seed as long as possible, to give as many people as possible a taste of the Greatest band in the history of Metal!
